00105 //KM:  New method is coded for more sophistocated rules.  All the information is stored within the gExitDialog struct 
00106 //           and calculated upon entry to this function instead of passing in multiple arguments and calculating it prior.
00107 BOOLEAN InternalInitSectorExitMenu( UINT8 ubDirection, INT16 sAdditionalData )
00108 {
00109       UINT32 uiTraverseTimeInMinutes;
00110       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00111       INT32 i;
00112       SGPRect     aRect;
00113       UINT16      usTextBoxWidth, usTextBoxHeight;
00114       UINT16      usMapPos = 0;
00115       INT8        bExitCode = -1;
00116       BOOLEAN     OkExitCode;
00117 
00118       //STEP 1:  Calculate the information for the exit gui
00119       memset( &gExitDialog, 0, sizeof( EXIT_DIALOG_STRUCT ) );
00120       gExitDialog.bSingleMoveWillIsolateEPC = -1;
00121 
00122       // OK, bring up dialogue... first determine some logic here...
00123       switch( ubDirection )
00124       {
00125             case EAST:
00126                   bExitCode = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00127                   break;
00128             case WEST:
00129                   bExitCode = WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00130                   break;
00131             case NORTH:
00132                   bExitCode = NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00133                   break;
00134             case SOUTH:
00135                   bExitCode = SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
00136                   break;
00137             case DIRECTION_EXITGRID:
00138                   bExitCode = -1;
00139                   usMapPos = sAdditionalData;
00140                   break;
00141       }
00142 
00143       OkExitCode = OKForSectorExit( bExitCode, usMapPos, &uiTraverseTimeInMinutes );
00144 
00145       if( uiTraverseTimeInMinutes <= 5 )
00146       { //if the traverse time is short, then traversal is percieved to be instantaneous.
00147             gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText = TRUE;
00148       }
00149 
00150       if( OkExitCode == 1 )
00151       {
00152             gExitDialog.fAllMoveDisabled  = TRUE;
00153             gExitDialog.fSingleMoveOn                 = TRUE;
00154             gExitDialog.fSingleMove                   = TRUE;
00155             if( gfRobotWithoutControllerAttemptingTraversal )
00156             {
00157                   gfRobotWithoutControllerAttemptingTraversal = FALSE;
00158                   gExitDialog.fUncontrolledRobotInSquad = TRUE;
00159             }
00160 
00161       }
00162       else if( OkExitCode == 2 )
00163       {
00164             gExitDialog.fAllMoveOn                    = TRUE;
00165             gExitDialog.fAllMove                            = TRUE;
00166       }
00167 
00168       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00169       {
00170             INT32 i, cnt = 0;
00171             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00172             {
00173                   if( OK_INSECTOR_MERC( MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
00174                         cnt++;
00175             }
00176             if( cnt != 1 )
00177             {
00178                   gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = TRUE;
00179             }
00180       }
00181       
00182       //STEP 2:  Setup the exit gui
00183       
00184       EnterModalTactical( TACTICAL_MODAL_WITHMOUSE );
00185       gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
00186       
00187       aRect.iTop        =     0;
00188       aRect.iLeft       =     0;
00189       aRect.iBottom =   INV_INTERFACE_START_Y;
00190       aRect.iRight      =     SCREEN_WIDTH;
00191 
00192 
00193       if( gExitDialog.fAllMoveOn )
00194       { //either an all-move in non-combat, or the last concious guy in combat.
00195             gExitDialog.fGotoSector                                     = TRUE;
00196       }
00197 
00198       gExitDialog.ubNumPeopleOnSquad                        = NumberOfPlayerControllableMercsInSquad( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bAssignment );
00199 
00200       //Determine 
00201       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00202       {
00203             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
00204             if( i == gusSelectedSoldier )
00205             {
00206                   continue;
00207             }
00208             if( !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors && 
00209                         pSoldier->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ &&
00210                         pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && 
00211                         pSoldier->bAssignment != MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bAssignment && 
00212                         pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW && pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT && pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD )
00213             { //KM:  We need to determine if there are more than one squad (meaning other concious mercs in a different squad or assignment)  
00214                   //           These conditions were done to the best of my knowledge, so if there are other situations that require modification, 
00215                   //           then feel free to do so.
00216                   gExitDialog.fMultipleSquadsInSector = TRUE; 
00217                   break;
00218             }
00219       }
00220 
00221       // Double check that ...
00222       // if we are a EPC and are the selected guy, make single move off and disable it....
00223       if ( AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ) )
00224       {
00225             // Check if there are more than one in this squad
00226             if ( gExitDialog.ubNumPeopleOnSquad > 1 )
00227             {
00228                   gExitDialog.fSingleMoveOn                       = FALSE;
00229                   gExitDialog.fAllMoveOn                          = TRUE;
00230                   gExitDialog.fSelectedMercIsEPC  = TRUE;
00231             }
00232             gExitDialog.fSingleMoveDisabled = TRUE;
00233       }
00234       else 
00235       { //check to see if we have one selected merc and one or more EPCs.
00236             //If so, don't allow the selected merc to leave by himself.
00237             //Assuming that the matching squad assignment is in the same sector.
00238             UINT8 ubNumMercs = 1; //selected soldier is a merc
00239             UINT8 ubNumEPCs = 0;
00240             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00241             {
00242                   if( i == gusSelectedSoldier )
00243                   {
00244                         continue;
00245                   }
00246                   if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bAssignment == MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bAssignment )
00247                   {
00248                         if( AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
00249                         {
00250                               ubNumEPCs++;
00251                               //record the slot of the epc.  If there are more than one EPCs, then
00252                               //it doesn't matter.  This is used in building the text message explaining
00253                               //why the selected merc can't leave.  This is how we extract the EPC's name.
00254                               gExitDialog.bSingleMoveWillIsolateEPC = (INT8)i;
00255                         }
00256                         else
00257                         { //We have more than one merc, so we will allow the selected merc to leave alone if
00258                               //the user so desired.
00259                               ubNumMercs++;
00260                               break;
00261                         }
00262                   }
00263             }
00264 
00265             if( ubNumMercs == 1 && ubNumEPCs >= 1 )
00266             {
00267                   gExitDialog.fSingleMoveOn                       = FALSE;
00268                   gExitDialog.fAllMoveOn                          = TRUE;
00269                   gExitDialog.fSingleMoveDisabled = TRUE;
00270                   if( ubNumEPCs > 1 )
00271                   {
00272                         gExitDialog.fSquadHasMultipleEPCs = TRUE;;
00273                   }
00274             }
00275       }
00276 
00277       if( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
00278       {
00279             if( gExitDialog.fMultipleSquadsInSector )
00280             { //We have multiple squads in a hostile sector.  That means that we can't load the adjacent sector.
00281                   gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = TRUE;
00282                   gExitDialog.fGotoSector = FALSE;
00283             }
00284             else if( GetNumberOfMilitiaInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) )
00285             { //Leaving this sector will result in militia being forced to fight the battle, can't load adjacent sector.
00286                   gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = TRUE;
00287                   gExitDialog.fGotoSector = FALSE;
00288             }
00289             if( !gExitDialog.fMultipleSquadsInSector && !gExitDialog.fAllMoveOn )
00290             {
00291                   gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = TRUE;
00292                   gExitDialog.fGotoSector = FALSE;
00293             }
00294       }
00295 
00296       if( !gExitDialog.fMultipleSquadsInSector && gExitDialog.fAllMoveOn )
00297       {
00298             gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = TRUE;
00299       }
00300 
00301       gExitDialog.ubDirection                                     = ubDirection;
00302       gExitDialog.sAdditionalData                           = sAdditionalData;
00303 
00304       gExitDialog.iBoxId = PrepareMercPopupBox( -1, DIALOG_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, DIALOG_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, TacticalStr[ EXIT_GUI_TITLE_STR ], 100, 85, 2, 75, &usTextBoxWidth, &usTextBoxHeight );
00305 
00306 
00307       gExitDialog.sX                      = (INT16)( ( ( ( aRect.iRight - aRect.iLeft ) - usTextBoxWidth ) / 2 ) + aRect.iLeft );
00308       gExitDialog.sY                      = (INT16)( ( ( ( aRect.iBottom - aRect.iTop ) - usTextBoxHeight ) / 2 ) + aRect.iTop );
00309       gExitDialog.usWidth           = usTextBoxWidth;
00310       gExitDialog.usHeight    = usTextBoxHeight;
00311 
00312       guiPendingOverrideEvent = EX_EXITSECTORMENU;
00313       HandleTacticalUI( );
00314       
00315 
00316       gfInSectorExitMenu = TRUE;
00317 
00318       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gExitDialog.BackRegion), 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST-1,
00319                                                                                                                   CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SectorExitBackgroundCallback ); 
00320 
00321       gExitDialog.iButtonImages                       = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\popupbuttons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00322 
00323 
00324       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gExitDialog.SingleRegion, (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 20), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 37), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 45 + 120), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 37 + 12), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00325                                                                                                                   CURSOR_NORMAL, SingleRegionMoveCallback, SingleRegionCallback ); 
00326       MSYS_AllowDisabledRegionFastHelp( &gExitDialog.SingleRegion, TRUE );
00327 
00328       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gExitDialog.AllRegion), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 20), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 57), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 45 + 120), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 57 + 12), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00329                                                                                                                   CURSOR_NORMAL, AllRegionMoveCallback, AllRegionCallback ); 
00330       MSYS_AllowDisabledRegionFastHelp( &gExitDialog.AllRegion, TRUE );
00331 
00332       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gExitDialog.LoadRegion), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 155), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 45), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 180 + 85), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 45 + 15), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00333                                                                                                                   CURSOR_NORMAL, LoadRegionMoveCallback, LoadRegionCallback ); 
00334       MSYS_AllowDisabledRegionFastHelp( &gExitDialog.LoadRegion, TRUE );
00335 
00336       gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton       = CreateCheckBoxButton( (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 155 ), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 43 ), "INTERFACE\\popupcheck.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, CheckLoadMapCallback );
00337 
00338       gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton      =  CreateCheckBoxButton(      (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 20 ), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 35 ), "INTERFACE\\popupradiobuttons.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, SingleMoveCallback );
00339 
00340       gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton               =  CreateCheckBoxButton(      (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 20 ), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 55 ), "INTERFACE\\popupradiobuttons.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, AllMoveCallback );
00341 
00342       gExitDialog.uiOKButton =      CreateIconAndTextButton( gExitDialog.iButtonImages, TacticalStr[ OK_BUTTON_TEXT_STR ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00343                                                                                                 FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00344                                                                                                 FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00345                                                                                                 TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00346                                                                                                 (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 65 ), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 78 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE ,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00347                                                                                                 DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)OKCallback );
00348 
00349       gExitDialog.uiCancelButton =  CreateIconAndTextButton( gExitDialog.iButtonImages, TacticalStr[ CANCEL_BUTTON_TEXT_STR ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00350                                                                                                 FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00351                                                                                                 FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00352                                                                                                 TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00353                                                                                                 (INT16)(gExitDialog.sX + 135 ), (INT16)(gExitDialog.sY + 78 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE ,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00354                                                                                                 DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)CancelCallback );
00355 
00356       gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
00357 
00358       InterruptTime();
00359       PauseGame();
00360       LockPauseState( 21 );
00361 
00362       return( TRUE );
00363 }

00365 void DoneFadeInWarp( void )
00366 {
00367 
00368 }
00369 
00370 
00371 void DoneFadeOutWarpCallback( void )
00372 {
00373       INT32 cnt;
00374       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00375 
00376   // Warp!
00377 
00378   // Set insertion data...
00379       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00380 
00381       // look for all mercs on the same team, 
00382       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00383       {       
00384             // Are we in this sector, On the current squad?
00385             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bInSector )
00386             {
00387                   gfTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
00388                   SetGroupSectorValue( gsWarpWorldX, gsWarpWorldY, gbWarpWorldZ, pSoldier->ubGroupID );
00389 
00390                   // Set next sectore
00391                   pSoldier->sSectorX = gsWarpWorldX;
00392                   pSoldier->sSectorY = gsWarpWorldY;
00393                   pSoldier->bSectorZ = gbWarpWorldZ;
00394 
00395                   // Set gridno
00396                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
00397                   pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = gsWarpGridNo;
00398                   // Set direction to face....
00399                   pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection             = 100 + NORTHWEST;
00400             }
00401       }
00402 
00403 
00404       // OK, insertion data found, enter sector!
00405       SetCurrentWorldSector( gsWarpWorldX, gsWarpWorldY, gbWarpWorldZ );
00406 
00407       // OK, once down here, adjust the above map with crate info....
00408       gfTacticalTraversal = FALSE;
00409       gpTacticalTraversalGroup = NULL;
00410       gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier = NULL;
00411 
00412       gFadeInDoneCallback = DoneFadeInWarp;
00413 
00414       FadeInGameScreen( );
00415 }
00416 
00417 
00418 void WarpToSurfaceCallback( UINT8 bExitValue )
00419 {
00420   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
00421       {
00422         gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutWarpCallback;
00423 
00424         FadeOutGameScreen( ); 
00425   }
00426   else
00427   {
00428     InternalInitSectorExitMenu( gubExitGUIDirection, gsExitGUIAdditionalData );
00429   }
00430 }
00431 
00432 
00433 BOOLEAN InitSectorExitMenu( UINT8 ubDirection, INT16 sAdditionalData )
00434 {
00435   gubExitGUIDirection     = ubDirection;
00436   gsExitGUIAdditionalData = sAdditionalData;
00437 
00438   if ( gbWorldSectorZ >= 2 && gubQuest[ QUEST_CREATURES ] == QUESTDONE )
00439   {
00440     if ( GetWarpOutOfMineCodes( &gsWarpWorldX, &gsWarpWorldY, &gbWarpWorldZ, &gsWarpGridNo ) )
00441     {
00442       // ATE: Check if we are in a creature lair and bring up box if so....
00443       DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 33 ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, WarpToSurfaceCallback, NULL );
00444 
00445       return( TRUE );
00446     }
00447   }
00448 
00449   return( InternalInitSectorExitMenu( ubDirection, sAdditionalData ) );
00450 }
00451 
00452 
00453 void UpdateSectorExitMenu( )
00454 {
00455       if ( gExitDialog.fGotoSector )
00456       {
00457             ButtonList[ gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00458       }
00459       else
00460       {
00461             ButtonList[ gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00462       }
00463 
00464       if ( gExitDialog.fSingleMove )
00465       {
00466             ButtonList[ gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00467       }
00468       else
00469       {
00470             ButtonList[ gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton ]->uiFlags &=(~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00471       }
00472 
00473       if ( gExitDialog.fAllMove )
00474       {
00475             ButtonList[ gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00476       }
00477       else
00478       {
00479             ButtonList[ gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton ]->uiFlags &=(~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00480       }
00481 
00482 
00483       if ( gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled )
00484       {
00485             DisableButton( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton );
00486             MSYS_DisableRegion(&(gExitDialog.LoadRegion ) );
00487             if( gExitDialog.fMultipleSquadsInSector && gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText && gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
00488             { //We have multiple squads in a hostile sector.  That means that we can't load the adjacent sector.
00489                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_CANT_LEAVE_HOSTILE_SECTOR_HELPTEXT ] );
00490                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.LoadRegion, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_CANT_LEAVE_HOSTILE_SECTOR_HELPTEXT ] );
00491             }
00492             else if( gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText )
00493             { //travesal is quick enough to allow the player to "warp" to the next sector and we MUST load it.
00494                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MUST_LOAD_ADJACENT_SECTOR_HELPTEXT ] );
00495                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.LoadRegion, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MUST_LOAD_ADJACENT_SECTOR_HELPTEXT ] );
00496             }
00497             else
00498             { //traversal takes too long to warrant instant travel (we MUST go to mapscreen)
00499                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MUST_GOTO_MAPSCREEN_HELPTEXT ] );
00500                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.LoadRegion, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MUST_GOTO_MAPSCREEN_HELPTEXT ] );
00501             }
00502       }
00503       else
00504       {
00505             EnableButton( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton );
00506             MSYS_EnableRegion(&(gExitDialog.LoadRegion ) );
00507             if( gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText )
00508             { //travesal is quick enough to allow the player to "warp" to the next sector and we load it.
00509                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_LOAD_ADJACENT_SECTOR_HELPTEXT ] );
00510                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.LoadRegion, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_LOAD_ADJACENT_SECTOR_HELPTEXT ] );
00511             }
00512             else
00513             { //traversal takes too long to warrant instant travel (we go to mapscreen)
00514                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_GOTO_MAPSCREEN_HELPTEXT ] );
00515                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.LoadRegion, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_GOTO_MAPSCREEN_HELPTEXT ] );
00516             }
00517       }
00518 
00519       if ( gExitDialog.fSingleMoveDisabled )
00520       {
00521             DisableButton( gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton );
00522             MSYS_DisableRegion(&(gExitDialog.SingleRegion) );
00523             if( gExitDialog.fSelectedMercIsEPC )
00524             { //EPCs cannot leave the sector alone and must be escorted
00525                   UINT16 str[ 256 ];
00526                   swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_ESCORTED_CHARACTERS_MUST_BE_ESCORTED_HELPTEXT ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
00527                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton, str );
00528                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.SingleRegion, str );          
00529             }
00530             else if( gExitDialog.bSingleMoveWillIsolateEPC != -1 )
00531             { //It has been previously determined that there are only two mercs in the squad, the selected merc
00532                   //isn't an EPC, but the other merc is.  That means that this merc cannot leave the sector alone
00533                   //as he would isolate the EPC.
00534                   UINT16 str[ 256 ];
00535                   if( !gExitDialog.fSquadHasMultipleEPCs )
00536                   {
00537                         if( gMercProfiles[ MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->ubProfile ].bSex == MALE )
00538                         { //male singular
00539                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_MALE_SINGULAR ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name, 
00540                                                             MercPtrs[ gExitDialog.bSingleMoveWillIsolateEPC ]->name );
00541                         }
00542                         else
00543                         { //female singular
00544                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_FEMALE_SINGULAR ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name, 
00545                                                             MercPtrs[ gExitDialog.bSingleMoveWillIsolateEPC ]->name );
00546                         }
00547                   }
00548                   else
00549                   {
00550                         if( gMercProfiles[ MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->ubProfile ].bSex == MALE )
00551                         { //male plural
00552                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_MALE_PLURAL ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
00553                         }
00554                         else
00555                         { //female plural
00556                               swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_MERC_CANT_ISOLATE_EPC_HELPTEXT_FEMALE_PLURAL ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
00557                         }
00558                   }
00559                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton, str );
00560                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.SingleRegion, str );          
00561             }
00562       }
00563       else
00564       {
00565             UINT16 str[ 256 ];
00566             EnableButton( gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton );
00567             MSYS_EnableRegion(&(gExitDialog.SingleRegion) );
00568             swprintf( str, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_SINGLE_TRAVERSAL_WILL_SEPARATE_SQUADS_HELPTEXT ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
00569             SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton, str );
00570             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.SingleRegion, str );
00571       }
00572 
00573       if ( gExitDialog.fAllMoveDisabled )
00574       {
00575             DisableButton( gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton );
00576             MSYS_DisableRegion(&(gExitDialog.AllRegion) );
00577             if( gExitDialog.fUncontrolledRobotInSquad )
00578             {
00579                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton, gzLateLocalizedString[ 1 ] );
00580                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.AllRegion, gzLateLocalizedString[ 1 ] );        
00581             }
00582             else
00583             {
00584                   SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_ALL_MERCS_MUST_BE_TOGETHER_TO_ALLOW_HELPTEXT ] );
00585                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.AllRegion, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_ALL_MERCS_MUST_BE_TOGETHER_TO_ALLOW_HELPTEXT ] );         
00586             }
00587       }
00588       else
00589       {
00590             EnableButton( gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton );
00591             MSYS_EnableRegion(&(gExitDialog.AllRegion) );
00592             SetButtonFastHelpText( gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_ALL_TRAVERSAL_WILL_MOVE_CURRENT_SQUAD_HELPTEXT ] );
00593             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gExitDialog.AllRegion, pExitingSectorHelpText[ EXIT_GUI_ALL_TRAVERSAL_WILL_MOVE_CURRENT_SQUAD_HELPTEXT ] );       
00594       }
00595 }
00596 
00597 void RenderSectorExitMenu( )
00598 {
00599       InputAtom Event;
00600 
00601       RestoreBackgroundRects();
00602       // ATE: Reset mouse Y
00603       gsGlobalCursorYOffset = 0;
00604       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00605       
00606       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00607       {
00608             if( Event.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00609             {
00610                   switch( Event.usParam )
00611                   {
00612                         case ESC:
00613                               RemoveSectorExitMenu( FALSE );
00614                               return;
00615                         case ENTER:
00616                               RemoveSectorExitMenu( TRUE );
00617                               return;
00618                   }
00619             }
00620       }
00621 
00622       UpdateSectorExitMenu( );
00623 
00624       RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( gExitDialog.iBoxId, gExitDialog.sX, gExitDialog.sY,  FRAME_BUFFER );
00625       InvalidateRegion( gExitDialog.sX, gExitDialog.sY, gExitDialog.usWidth, gExitDialog.usHeight );
00626 
00627       SetFont( FONT12ARIAL );
00628       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00629       
00630 
00631       if ( gExitDialog.fSingleMoveDisabled ) 
00632       {
00633             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
00634       }
00635       else if ( gExitDialog.fSingleMoveHilighted ) 
00636       {
00637             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );                        
00638       }
00639       else
00640       {
00641             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );                     
00642       }
00643       mprintf( gExitDialog.sX + 45, gExitDialog.sY + 37, TacticalStr[ EXIT_GUI_SELECTED_MERC_STR ] );
00644 
00645 
00646       if ( gExitDialog.fAllMoveDisabled ) 
00647       {
00648             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
00649       }
00650       else if ( gExitDialog.fAllMoveHilighted ) 
00651       {
00652             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );                        
00653       }
00654       else
00655       {
00656             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );                     
00657       }
00658       mprintf( gExitDialog.sX + 45, gExitDialog.sY + 57, TacticalStr[ EXIT_GUI_ALL_MERCS_IN_SQUAD_STR ] );
00659 
00660 
00661       if ( gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled ) 
00662       {
00663             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
00664       }
00665       else if ( gExitDialog.fGotoSectorHilighted ) 
00666       {
00667             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );                        
00668       }
00669       else
00670       {
00671             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );                     
00672       }
00673 
00674       if( gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText )
00675       { //only if tactical traversal is from one town sector to another town sector (5 minute convenience warp)
00676             mprintf( gExitDialog.sX + 180, gExitDialog.sY + 45, TacticalStr[ EXIT_GUI_GOTO_SECTOR_STR ] );
00677       }
00678       else
00679       { //most sectors don't allow tactical traversal.  Exiting results in entering the mapscreen.
00680             mprintf( gExitDialog.sX + 180, gExitDialog.sY + 45, TacticalStr[ EXIT_GUI_GOTO_MAP_STR ] );
00681       }
00682 
00683       SaveBackgroundRects();
00684       RenderFastHelp();
00685 
00686       MarkAButtonDirty( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton );
00687       MarkAButtonDirty( gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton );
00688       MarkAButtonDirty( gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton );
00689       MarkAButtonDirty( gExitDialog.uiOKButton );
00690       MarkAButtonDirty( gExitDialog.uiCancelButton );
00691 }
00692 
00693 
00694 BOOLEAN HandleSectorExitMenu( )
00695 {
00696       return( FALSE ); //Why???
00697 }
00698 
00699 void RemoveSectorExitMenu( BOOLEAN fOk )
00700 {
00701       INT16       Str[ 50 ];
00702 
00703       if ( gfInSectorExitMenu )
00704       {
00705 
00706             guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
00707 
00708             RemoveButton( gExitDialog.uiLoadCheckButton );
00709             RemoveButton( gExitDialog.uiSingleMoveButton );
00710             RemoveButton( gExitDialog.uiAllMoveButton );
00711             RemoveButton( gExitDialog.uiOKButton );
00712             RemoveButton( gExitDialog.uiCancelButton );
00713 
00714             
00715             UnloadButtonImage( gExitDialog.iButtonImages );
00716 
00717             MSYS_RemoveRegion(&(gExitDialog.BackRegion) );
00718             MSYS_RemoveRegion(&(gExitDialog.SingleRegion) );
00719             MSYS_RemoveRegion(&(gExitDialog.AllRegion) );
00720             MSYS_RemoveRegion(&(gExitDialog.LoadRegion) );
00721 
00722             //Remove the popup box
00723             RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( gExitDialog.iBoxId );
00724             gExitDialog.iBoxId = -1;
00725 
00726             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00727 
00728             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00729 
00730             gfInSectorExitMenu = FALSE;
00731 
00732             UnLockPauseState();
00733             UnPauseGame();
00734             EndModalTactical();
00735             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00736 
00737             // if we are an EPC, don't allow this if nobody else on squad
00738             if ( fOk && AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ) )
00739             {
00740                   // Check if there are more than one in this squad
00741                   if ( gExitDialog.ubNumPeopleOnSquad == 0 )
00742                   {
00743                         swprintf( (wchar_t *) Str, pMessageStrings[     MSG_EPC_CANT_TRAVERSE ], MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->name );
00744                         
00745                         DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, Str, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
00746                         return;
00747                   }
00748             }
00749 
00750             if ( fOk )
00751             {
00752                   // Handle the effects here!
00753                   if ( gExitDialog.fAllMove && gExitDialog.fGotoSector && gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText )
00754                   {
00755                         JumpIntoAdjacentSector( gExitDialog.ubDirection, JUMP_ALL_LOAD_NEW, gExitDialog.sAdditionalData  );         
00756                         return;
00757                   }
00758 
00759                   //KM : August 6, 1999 Patch fix
00760                   //     Added the !gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText to the conditions to prevent the player from LOADING an 
00761                   //     adjacent sector (this only happens when instant traversal is overriden because of a battle in progress
00762                   //     in the previous sector
00763                   if ( gExitDialog.fAllMove && ( !gExitDialog.fGotoSector || !gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText ) )
00764                   {
00765                         // Here, move all men out of sector but don't load new one...
00766                         JumpIntoAdjacentSector( gExitDialog.ubDirection, JUMP_ALL_NO_LOAD, gExitDialog.sAdditionalData );           
00767                   }
00768 
00769                   if ( gExitDialog.fSingleMove && gExitDialog.fGotoSector && gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText )
00770                   {
00771                         JumpIntoAdjacentSector( gExitDialog.ubDirection, JUMP_SINGLE_LOAD_NEW, gExitDialog.sAdditionalData );       
00772                         return;
00773                   }
00774 
00775                   //KM : August 6, 1999 Patch fix
00776                   //     Added the !gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText to the conditions to prevent the player from LOADING an 
00777                   //     adjacent sector (this only happens when instant traversal is overriden because of a battle in progress
00778                   //     in the previous sector
00779                   if ( gExitDialog.fSingleMove && ( !gExitDialog.fGotoSector || !gExitDialog.fGotoSectorText ) )
00780                   {
00781                         // Here, move all men out of sector but don't load new one...
00782                         JumpIntoAdjacentSector( gExitDialog.ubDirection, JUMP_SINGLE_NO_LOAD, gExitDialog.sAdditionalData );        
00783                   }
00784 
00785             }
00786       }
00787 }

00790 void CheckLoadMapCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00791 {
00792       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00793       {
00794             gExitDialog.fGotoSector =!gExitDialog.fGotoSector;
00795       }

00797 
00798 void SingleMoveAction()
00799 {
00800       //KM: New logic Mar2 '99
00801       if( !gExitDialog.fMultipleSquadsInSector )
00802       {
00803             if( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
00804             { //if enemy in sector, and mercs will be left behind, prevent user from selecting load
00805                   gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = TRUE;
00806                   gExitDialog.fGotoSector = FALSE;
00807             }
00808             else
00809             { //freedom to load or not load
00810                   gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = FALSE;
00811             }
00812       }
00813       else
00814       {
00815             gExitDialog.fGotoSector = FALSE;
00816       }
00817       gExitDialog.fSingleMove = TRUE;
00818       gExitDialog.fAllMove          = FALSE;
00819       //end
00820 
00821       //previous logic
00822       /*
00823       gExitDialog.fGotoSector = FALSE;
00824       gExitDialog.fSingleMove = TRUE;
00825       gExitDialog.fAllMove          = FALSE;
00826       */
00827 }
00828 
00829 void AllMoveAction()
00830 {
00831       //KM: New logic Mar2 '99
00832       if( !gExitDialog.fMultipleSquadsInSector )
00833       {
00834             gExitDialog.fGotoSectorDisabled = TRUE;
00835             gExitDialog.fGotoSector = TRUE;
00836       }
00837       gExitDialog.fSingleMove = FALSE;
00838       gExitDialog.fAllMove          = TRUE;
00839       //end
00840 
00841       //previous logic
00842       /*
00843       gExitDialog.fSingleMove = FALSE;
00844       gExitDialog.fAllMove          = TRUE;
00845       */
00846 }
00847 
00848 void SingleMoveCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00849 {
00850       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00851       {
00852             SingleMoveAction();
00853       }
00854 }
00855       
00856 
00857 void AllMoveCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00858 {
00859       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00860       {
00861             AllMoveAction();
00862       }
00863 }

00865 
00866 void OKCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00867 {
00868       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00869       {
00870             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00871       }
00872       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP  )
00873       {
00874             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00875 
00876             // OK, exit
00877             RemoveSectorExitMenu( TRUE );
00878 
00879       }
00880 
00881 }
00882 
00883 void CancelCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00884 {
00885       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00886       {
00887             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00888       }
00889       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP  )
00890       {
00891             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00892 
00893             // OK, exit
00894             RemoveSectorExitMenu( FALSE );
00895       }
00896 
00897 }
